text: Britta Reimers (born 27 July 1971) is a German politician. For one term from 2009 until 2014 she served as a Member of the European Parliament (MEP) representing Germany. She served as a member of the Free Democratic Party, part of the Alliance of Liberals and Democrats for Europe.http://www.europarl.europa.eu/meps/en/96875/BRITTA_REIMERS_home.html During her time in Parliament she served as a Member of the Committee on Agriculture and Rural Development and the Committee on Fisheries. Reimers trained as a farmer and lives on her dairy farm in Steinburg. ==References== Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Free Democratic Party (Germany) MEPs Category:German farmers Category:MEPs for Germany 2009–2014 Category:21st-century women MEPs for Germany Category:People from Itzehoe
title: Britta Reimers
